document.full_text: iran seems to have carried out nuclear-related work with possible military links until recently, the u.n. atomic watchdog chief said on monday, citing new information adding to concerns about tehran's activities.
document.title: new data suggests iran military link: u.n. atom chief
lines_and_colors: iran seems to have carried out nuclear-related work with possible military links until recently, the u.n. atomic watchdog chief said on monday, citing new information adding to concerns about tehran's activities.
